predicate.note: Frames file for 'synchronize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: passive, separate args
example.text: In the Bell Labs experiments, an MRI-type of machine, synchronized *trace* with the heartbeat via an electrocardiogram, rapidly flashes a magnetic field on and off as blood passes a certain point in a vessel.

example.name: active, merged args
example.text: The need for hurried last-minute telephone negotiations among market officials will disappear once rules are in place that *trace* synchronize circuit breakers in all markets.
